name: Cross for the Four Day Marches
description:
The Cross for the Four Day Marches (Dutch: Vierdaagsekruis) is a Dutch Royal decoration awarded for successful participation in the International Four Days Marches Nijmegen (Vierdaagse in Dutch) held annually at Nijmegen, The Netherlands.

The Four Days Marches were held during the first days of r/Place 2023.
